H0.text: In which religion is the temple, or place of worship, known as the gurdwara. Hinduism

H1.text: In which religion is the temple, or place of worship, known as the gurdwara. Buddhism

H2.text: In which religion is the temple, or place of worship, known as the gurdwara. Jainism

H3.text: In which religion is the temple, or place of worship, known as the gurdwara. Sikhi

A4.text: A gurdwara is a place of assembly and worship in Sikhism

A5.text: A gurdwara can be identified from a distance by tall flagpoles bearing the Nishan Sahib, the Sikh flag
